title: (02007) Albacete - 130 Terreno Sector 3

title: (02006) Albacete - s/n Calle Alcalde Conangla
description: Parking lot next to shopping center, gas station and Burger King, which is open until 1:00 am. However, it only has standard-sized spaces and the shopping center makes it difficult to get two contiguous parking spaces. Therefore only recommended for small vehicles (up to panel vans with 6m).

title: (02002) Albacete - 1 Calle de Muñoz Seca
description: Self service laundrette. 3 washing machines and 2 dryers.

title: (02006) Albacete - 3 Calle Blancanieves
description: Place in a newly built, clean and quiet part of town, close to mcDonals KFC, Lidl, a very close dog park for our four legged members of the family, as well as a shopping mall. Mercadona a few streets further. Just 200m away, a park with swings 500m away, and next to the park, the festival of trees with public restrooms with picnic areas. 15m from the center and the fairgrounds on foot. there is not much shade but very quiet to spend the night or spend the day.

title: (02006) Albacete - 1 Calle Parque Público
description: Parking near public garden and boulles playground. Proximity Carrefour store. Peaceful night.

title: (02008) Albacete - Avenida de España, 73
description:
Free area with 8 designated motorhome pitches but the car park has space for many more. Firm ground level. Point with service: fresh water, gray water, black water. 3 km from the city center.
The water fill is smooth with no threads for a fitting.

title: (02006) Albacete - 4914 Terreno Diseminados
description: Gas station parking and large cafeteria restaurant. Stop for lunch or coffee.

title: () Albacete -
description: Generous parking area with picnic possibilities. Nice and quiet on the edge of the forest. Easily accessible from the country road.

title: (02008) Albacete - Km 65 Autovía de Alicante
description: Gas station with Burger King is great parking and more restaurants in front

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 3 Calle Camilo José Cela
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 3 Calle Camilo José Cela
description: Parking at the top next to the castle. Place overlooking the La Mancha plain.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 9I Calle Fuente
description: Very clean, spacious place with well-made supply and disposal. No electricity, WiFi only in the old town at the tourist information. Concrete drain with channel for gray water, spatially separate water connections for drinking water and rinsing water. Separate waste disposal possible at the top of the stairs, residual waste container at the disposal station. Beautiful old town with old castle. Well restored with super views over the countryside. Easily doable on foot, but various stairs. Various restaurants and tapas bars in the city. Warning: Market on every Thursday morning, area partially restricted.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 2 Avenida de Levante
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 2 Avenida de Levante
description: Really convenient place to clean your motorhome. Our 2,85 high van fitted in the roofed cubicals but behind the gasstation you’ll also find a cubical without a roof. Downsite though that there was no broom, just a pistol. What made me decide to add this was the really convenient wall next to it which you can easily climb which allows you to clean the top of your van ergo your solar panels. After a few weeks parking next to the sea, that was more then welcome!

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 28 Calle San Cristóbal
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 28 Calle San Cristóbal
description: Small parking that serves as a view of the village 3 parking spaces with beautiful views just above the communal area free

title: (02110) La Gineta - Autovía de Alicante
description: Free parking area, with public toilets and water supply.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - Camino de Santa Fé
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - Camino de Santa Fé

title: (02007) Albacete - 12 AB-823
description: The parking lot is located between two villages. He's very flat. Below is the picnic area. We stayed here overnight. Thanks to the lack of lighting, we were able to look at a wonderful starry sky. We only found the lack of cell phone reception and the noise of the cars annoying.

title: (02110) La Gineta - Cañada Real del Villar de Pozo Rubio
title_short: (02110) La Gineta - Cañada Real del Villar de Pozo Rubio
description: Recreation and leisure area, ideal for cycling and hiking, very quiet place. It is a pine forest with playgrounds for children, and barbecues but with restrictions. Good place to spend the night, although it means leaving the highway for a few kilometers.

description: Mahora motorhome area, all free and a beautiful town to visit

title: (02320) Balazote - VVJ4+RG

title: (02249) Jorquera - 31 AB-206
description: Siding where you can spend the night, a very quiet place with beautiful views around. Lots of cyclists and the whole road, very narrow, is very picturesque.

title: (02151) Casas de Juan Núñez - 17 Calle Molino
title_short: (02151) Casas de Juan Núñez - 17 Calle Molino
description: We sleep in this place before a cycling race, very quiet night without any noise. There are bars nearby. Located next to a sports center with swimming pool (summer).

title: (02249) Cubas - 188 Poblado Cubas
description:
Parking on the banks of the Júcar river for the parking of any vehicle. Overnight stay is allowed. It is a small cave village. A highly recommended place to visit. It has trails with a great diversity of vegetation and wildlife.
100m from the parking there is a bar. They close on Mondays. The rest of the days it is open, although if you find the door closed, you ring the bell and they attend you kindly.

title: (02639) Barrax - 0 Calle Albacete
description: Right next to the municipal pavilion. Quiet street, although in the morning the traffic of the nearby road begins to be heard. We slept very well. On the street behind, the Gasparini bar is an option (almost the only one) for dinner, and right in front, the Paseo bar is perfect for breakfast if you don't feel like doing it in the van. It is near Ruidera and its lagoon. You can also visit its windmill.

title: (02630) La Roda - 218 Autovía de Alicante
description: Rest area, with parking for about 10 vehicles, next to the transfer area; quiet with picnic tables and in the shade; access is a little complicated if you do not know the area: from the motorway, take exit 41 and turn right towards the Paintings Macy (store), or conversely from the entrance to El Sueño de Jemik. At the roundabout, take the first exit. When you climb the hill, go straight for 2.5 km. Be careful, there is no tap or fountain

title: (02100) Tarazona de la Mancha - 56 Calle Santa Ana
title_short: (02100) Tarazona de la Mancha - 56 Calle Santa Ana
description: Behind the cemetery. Ideal for spending a night in transit. Fairly flat on the earthen esplanade. They have extended the place and there is no more room, but on the other side of the road there is a large leveled esplanade. Be careful on Wednesday morning because there is a market and access is more complicated.

title: (02129) Pozohondo - AB-409
description: Very small recreation in the direction of Albacete. No type of service, not even garbage, but well shaded.

title: (02639) Barrax - Calle Benavente
description: Parking at the foot of a windmill, on the very edge of the town. small childrens park and picnic benches. Views over surrounding countryside.

title_short: (02630) La Roda - 22 Calle Casa del Olmo

title: (02630) La Roda - 3 Calle Vicente Blasco Ibáñez
title_short: (02630) La Roda - 3 Calle Vicente Blasco Ibáñez
description: Very quiet street next to the municipal park, level parking lots with lighting. A few meters from the municipal swimming pool, and from the town center. In the park there is a fountain with drinking water, and it is very pleasant to take a walk, especially if you go with children and dogs.

title: (02630) La Roda - 2 Calle el Bonillo
description: Quiet apartment on a street where cars hardly pass, right next to an avenue. There is quite a lot of shade and a walk next to it, there is also the park a few meters away, with water fountains. The center is a 5 minute walk away. In the two avenues that are in the surroundings it is also a good place to stop.

title: (02249) Jorquera - 36 Calle Trapisondas
description: Park in Jorquera very quiet area next to the park, in fact, we were so comfortable that we did not take pictures, near a local pool with a bar to eat inside very good price, hao another area near the peronism river warned of noise and mosquitoes. the small park. There is a spring and some splendid views.

title: (02248) Jorquera -
description: "The beach" of Jorquera. Enabled parking. Restaurant. Fluvial beach on the river Júcar. Impressive route through cave houses following the course of the river. Adventure park. Not very crowded. An oasis !!!

title: (02249) Jorquera - AB-880
description: Viewpoint on the edge of a very quiet road. With shade and benches. Nice views of the town of Jorquera. A little uneven

title: (02695) Villar de Chinchilla -
description: Dirt road that has some places where you can park with a 7.5m AC without problem. In the middle of nowhere, next to a very quiet road that has no traffic at night. We slept very well, sheltered by the oaks.

title: (02249) La Recueja - B-8
description: It is just a stop on a local road, but the place is flat, a van or a car fits to spend the night and the views are spectacular. #Stealth

title: (02630) La Roda - 209 N-301
description: Parking next to Juanito Restaurant. Located next to gasoline. Spacious places where you can spend the night. They can also stop caravans. In addition there are some washrooms right next to it with very good access for large vehicles

title: (02154) Villavaliente - 25 Calle Joaquín Pardo
description: Area to park and enjoy the pool in the town of Villavaliente. Bar, bakery, small supermarket ... You have a fountain in the park. There are MTB routes in the area. Perfect for visiting Alcalá del Júcar, on the way to Albacete. Be respectful with the people of the town, they are very kind and friendly people.

title: (02247) Cenizate - 2 Calle Fuentealbilla
description: Level gravel car park just outside of town. Car and motorhome wash, drinking water fountain in a shady pine forest, hermitage to visit, church, open public swimming pool in summer with showers and changing rooms, gas station and shops nearby, bars and pubs in the town to have a few drinks. Place calm

title: (02636) Villalgordo del Júcar - 1 Calle las Huertas
title_short: (02636) Villalgordo del Júcar - 1 Calle las Huertas
description: Villalgordo del Júcar area.  Parking behind the swimming pool in a dedicated area. Alongside the river, and just a few hundred meters from the centre.

title: (02636) Villalgordo del Júcar - 19 Avenida Príncipe de España
title_short: (02636) Villalgordo del Júcar - 19 Avenida Príncipe de España
description: Municipal park at the bottom near the river. Very quiet, we spent the night parked in the parking lot above (80 meters from the river).

title: (02260) Fuentealbilla -
description:
Nice little lake with a large parking lot, suitable for 8 - 10 campers.
The approach route is unpaved for the last 1.5 km, but it is definitely worth it.

title: (02210) Alcalá del Júcar - B-5

title_short: (02210) Alcalá del Júcar - 51 Avenida los Robles

title_short: (16707) Casas de Benítez - 41 Calle el Molino
description: Casas de Benítez (Cuenca) LA CUESTA Service Station, wide esplanade to park in front of the pump, video surveillance cameras, laundry room and 24-hour self-service gas station. For each fuel filling we give you a bottle of village wine.

title: (16708) Pozoamargo - Autovía de Alicante
description: Picnic area next to the highway. It has no shadows, yes picnic tables. On very hot summer days it will be unbearable but in summer or air days it is good to stop on the way just to eat.

title: (02500) Tobarra - Cm-3215
description: Developed industrial area without development. Parking at the roadside, relatively straight at the top. No service, no bins. Internet very good. Absolutely quiet, ideal for dogs

title: (02200) Casas-Ibáñez - 4 Calle Ruedo
description: Zone to stop and spend the night when it's not the weekend, because young people make noise. In this commune, the question of the night is not regulated. You can walk to the supermarkets and eat well in the tapas bars.

title: (02500) Tobarra -
description: Parking next to the sanctuary, only vans, beautiful views, nature and a very beautiful church to visit, there are drinking fountains and two public toilets that are not always open, you can walk around the area and beautiful views of the town

title: (02270) Villamalea - Camino de Villamalea al M
title_short: (02270) Villamalea - Camino de Villamalea al M
description: Perfect place to spend the night and spend a few days. It is a picnic area next to the chapel, 3 km from the nearest town, Villamalea. In the middle of nature and with sources of drinking water. There are bins and containers, please use them. You can do several hiking trails. The Los Angeles Grotto is about 5 miles away and it's also a nice place to see.

title: (16708) Pozoamargo - 34 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Repsol gas station car park. There are covered and uncovered sites for Motorhomes. There were more motorhomes

title: (02410) Liétor - 20 Avenida la Paz

title: (02410) Liétor - 6 Calle los Pasos
